tagline: PhD Student, Department of Politics, New York University
body:
## About me


I am a Ph.D. student in the [Department of Politics](http://politics.as.nyu.edu/page/home) at [New York University](www.nyu.edu). My primary areas of research include social media and politics, electoral institutions and behavior, and political corruption.

I received a BA and MA in Political Science and Public Administration at the [Pompeu Fabra University](http://www.upf.edu/dcpis/) in Barcelona. I also have a Master of Research in Political Science at the [European University Institute](http://www.eui.eu/DepartmentsAndCentres/PoliticalAndSocialSciences/Index.aspx), in Florence.

On this website you will find information about myself and my research.

## Contact

Email: pablo.barbera[at]nyu.edu

Twitter: [@p_barbera](twitter.com/p_barbera)
